regex: quota exceeding. The account\[uuid: .*] exceeds a quota\[name: .*, value: .*], Current used:.*, Request:.*. Please contact the administrator.
message_cn: 配额超限.帐户[uuid:%1$s ] 超出配额[名称: %2$s, 数量: %3$s], 当前使用:%4$s, 要求:%5$s. 请您与管理员联系.
message_en: quota exceeding.The account[uuid:%1$s ] exceeds a quota[name: %2$s , value: %3$s], Current used:%4$s, Request:%5$s. Please contact the administrator.

regex: There has been a l2Network\[uuid:.*, name:.*] attached to cluster\[uuid:.*] that has physical interface\[.*]. Failed to attach l2Network\[uuid:.*]
message_cn: L2Network挂载失败，L2网络的物理接口[%4$s]已经被L2Network网络[%2$s]挂载到集群上
message_en: L2Network attached failed, the physical interface[%4$s] has already been attached to the cluster by L2Network[%2$s]

regex: unable to connect to KVM\[ip:.*, username:.*, sshPort:.*] to check the management node connectivity,please check if username/password is wrong; null
message_cn: 无法连接到 KVM[ip:%1&s, username:%2&s, sshPort:%3&s]，用户名、密码或者端口可能是错误的
message_en: cloudn't connetc to KVM[ip:%1&s, username:%2&s, sshPort:%3&s], User name or password or port number may be problematic

regex: The host\[uuid:.*]'s available memory capacity\[.*] is lower than the reserved capacity\[.*]
message_cn: 主机[uuid:%1&s]的可用内存容量[%2$s]低于预留容量[%3&s]
message_en: The host[uuid:%1&s]'s available memory capacity[%2&s] is lower than the reserved capacity[%3&s]

regex: current vm instance state\[.*] doesn't allow to proceed message\[.*], allowed states are \[.*, .*]
message_cn: 云主机当前状态[%1&s]不支持该操作
message_en: current vm instance state[%1&s] doesn't allow the operation

regex: \[.*] is not a standard cidr, do you mean \[.*]?
message_cn: [%1&s]不是一个标准CIDR,您是否想使用[%2&s]?
message_en: [%1$s] is not a standard cidr, do you mean [%2$s]?

regex: operation error, because:qemu-agent service is not ready in vm...
message_en: operation error, because:qemu-agent service is not ready in vm...
